review: From Nov 2020 i am under treatment with Dr. Ravi Kesari. He ** * **** **** ****** *** listens to patient's problems calmly. He diagnosed my problem and advised me suitably with very small dosage of medicines. Overall he is a nice Doctor and can be recommended.

Just amazing doctor. He is very patient with us and listened to all our health problems, went thru the report carefully and prescribed medicine very well. Extremely happy with him and we are consulting him since last 8 months

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had a very bad experience at Apollo spectra (Koramangala) and very bad behaviour by the doctor when I went to show the reports of the tests suggested by Dr. RAVI KESARI.  He asked us to move out of the cabin closing the reports he was seeing because he wanted to go for lunch. ***** ** **** ********* **** ******* ** ******* 
Apollo should have the rule at the hospital that walkin patient may go after 2-3 patient. I waited till 5 patients completed. 
I went to the doctor for the pain i was having under ribs. 

When went inside the doctors room, one fat nurse came and said here is one appointment patient. The doctor said no i cant check you like that, I have to go for lunch. ***** ** **** ********* **** ******** ******* *** ** ******* ***** *** ****** ********* **** *** ****** **** ****** *** *** ***********
Apollo should not call patients for revisit if this is the case. 
Would not like to get consulted again at such hospitals.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctors are like God for us. We go to them thinking that we will get cured. Saying that, it is helpful if the doctors patiently listen and not be rude to their patients and not be in hurry. But, this was not the case with Dr. Ravi. The patient and the family are already going through a lot and the doctor should understand this and create a positive environment. This was not the case with Dr.Ravi hence I will.not recommend him coz, I do not want other patients to suffer like us and keep looking for different doctor again.

very bad experience.. pathetic experience..immediately charged 500 rs even when doctor had not come..Doctor just prescribed some generalized medicines and did not listen even symptoms. he was in very hurry. very very bad experience.Don't ever go to this doctor , now worth at all.

Today I visited this doctor in Narayana Clinic Sarjapur Road. He asked me for symptoms and prescribed the medicines. He didn’t examine at all. He took exactly 2 mins for the consultation. I will not recommend this doctor.

Doctor has immense experience, *** ** ************* **** *** **** *** ** ******* He does not listen and he is extremely rude. I wish he somehow gets this message, understands and make amends to the way he functions.
In an extreme rush, does not want to listen to symptoms, just wants to ‘transfer’ your case. Do not consult this doctor.

**** *** ****** * **** **** *********. I had a ***** throat infection and he wasn't ready to check me. He expects patients to wear mask but doesn't wear himself.
He just wrote down ***** ***** medicines. Not at all recommended.
He was very good.. Also doesn't unnecessarily recommend you for tests.. Overall my experience with his consultation was very good

From Nov 2020 i am under treatment with Dr. Ravi Kesari. He ** * **** **** ****** *** listens to patient's problems calmly. He diagnosed my problem and advised me suitably with very small dosage of medicines. Overall he is a nice Doctor and can be recommended.

Just amazing doctor. He is very patient with us and listened to all our health problems, went thru the report carefully and prescribed medicine very well. Extremely happy with him and we are consulting him since last 8 months
